3gO

3graduatesOfficial

Create a profile, share posts and hang around

3gO is an excellent way of getting in touch with people who share your interests, making new friends and having fun. View profiles, create posts or comment on existing ones to really get that community feeling.

Members

A list of all users, made simple.

By visiting the members are you get an overview of all users and some basic info about them. If someone catches your eye, you can view their detailed profile by clicking on "View Profile". Who knows? maybe that person is your next best friend.

View profiles

3gO can be used with devices of any screen size.

Share posts with your fellow 3gO users in seconds.

By clicking on the "Post Feed" link, you will visit the posts area, where you can catch up to all the latest news, or let your friends know what's on your mind. If you want to, you can add comments to existing posts or like them - don't worry, you can always take back a like or even delete your comment or post.

Get started now!

3gO uses Gravatar, so add that to your email!

Why bother with uploading profile pictures to every site you join? With gravatar that is taken care of for you with a simple registration and one time setup. Don't lose time choosing pictures, spend it posting instead.
